name: triadbalance
author: Robert L. Read, <read.robert@gmail.com> (https://pubinv.github.io/PubInv/)
description: Interactive widget/diagram to represent a balance of a triad or trinity of attributes, such as Mind/Body/Spirt or Strength/Endurance/Flexibility

scripts.build: npm run bbrowser; npm run build-browser-test; npm run copy-all
scripts.copy-all: cp src/TriadBalance.css dist/TriadBalance.css; cp dist/TriadBalance.js TriadBalance.forJSFiddle.js
